de.dfki.lt.mary
Class Mary

java.lang.Object
  de.dfki.lt.mary.Mary

public class Mary
extends java.lang.Object

The main program for the mary TtS system. It can run as a socket server or as a stand-alone program.

Author:
Marc Schröder

modulesRequiredForProcessing

public static java.util.LinkedList<MaryModule> modulesRequiredForProcessing(MaryDataType sourceType,
                                                                            MaryDataType targetType,
                                                                            java.util.Locale locale)
A method for determining the list of modules required to transform the given source data type into the requested target data type.

Returns:
the (ordered) list of modules required, or null if no such list could be found.

modulesRequiredForProcessing

public static java.util.LinkedList<MaryModule> modulesRequiredForProcessing(MaryDataType sourceType,
                                                                            MaryDataType targetType,
                                                                            java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                            Voice voice)
A method for determining the list of modules required to transform the given source data type into the requested target data type. If the voice given is not null, any preferred modules it may have are taken into account.

Returns:
the (ordered) list of modules required, or null if no such list could be found.

shutdown

public static void shutdown()

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
The starting point of the Mary program. If server mode is requested by property settings, starts the MaryServer; otherwise, a Request is created reading from the file given as first argument and writing to System.out.

Usage:

As a socket server: 

 java -Dmary.base=$MARY_BASE -Dserver=true de.dfki.lt.mary.Mary

As a stand-alone program: 

 java -Dmary.base=$MARY_BASE de.dfki.lt.mary.Mary myfile.txt

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
See Also:
MaryProperties, MaryServer, RequestHandler, Request
